mapper.select:
SELECT e.empNo, name, depName, posName, rankName FROM employee e JOIN person_record pr ON e.empNo = pr.empNo JOIN department d ON pr.depNo = d.depNo JOIN rank r ON pr.rankNo = r.rankNo JOIN position p ON pr.posNo = p.posNo
e.empNo != #{empNo} AND pr.state = 1 AND
INSTR(${condition}, #{keyword}) > 0
ORDER BY name
